BIO

After being a Makeup Artist for 16 years, I have finally decided to pursue my dream and passion to become a web developer. I'm currently near the end of my Immersive Software Engineering course from General Assembly in Sydney. I always had an interest in Information technology and computers and now I have decided to change my career. I like problem-solving and creating new things and I spend my free time coding to improve my skills everyday.
